author: ylavic
msg: Commit 6 on 6 to fix reentrance (incomplete Zlib header or validation bytes) in mod_deflate's output and input filters.
Ignore empty buckets and split buckets longer than INT_MAX (since zlib uses 32-bit ints only) in all filters.

author: ylavic
msg: Commit 5 on 6 to fix reentrance (incomplete Zlib header or validation bytes) in mod_deflate's output and input filters.
Handle Zlib flags in the inflate input filter as in the output filter, using consume_zlib_flags().

author: ylavic
msg: Commit 4 on 6 to fix reentrance (incomplete Zlib header or validation bytes) in mod_deflate's output and input filters.
Handle non blocking reads which would block in the inflate input filter (not an error).
